title: Nengren Temple
description: Chinese name 能仁斋馆, address 桂林市丽君路6号码. Remodeled in 2013, this vegetarian restaurant is located adjacent to the Nengren Temple inside the same gates. Offers a buffet every new and full moon, costs round 30rmb; other times order from the menu. Many mock meat dishes and a huge bowl of noodles for under 10rmb. Directions: at Xinyi Rd 信义路, just across the red bridge from downtown.
